Activating the Elimination tourney for the Ima Fimba meet
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Battles: Activating the Elimination tourney for the Ima Fimba meet
By Abb122 on Tuesday, April 24, 2001 - 09:57 pm:

Simple enough question. For an ungodly reason, I cant get the Elimination tourney to show up on July 4th. Im training a grade B pheonix, and the year is 1032. Any help?

By scopedog on Wednesday, April 25, 2001 - 06:16 am:

Two questions:

1) Have you competed in it before?
2) If so, what year?

The IMa-FIMBA meets are every four years from the *first* one you get invited to. For example, in my current game, they didn't start til 1001 because I chose not to battle June 1000, and thus hadn't raised my monster (a Kasumi at the time) to at least D-class.

By Lisa Shock on Wednesday, April 25, 2001 - 09:01 am:

In chat last night, Abb122 indicated that he had gotten an invite but never bothered to attend. He had also checked every July for more than 4 years.

-Hope this helps!

By Abb122 on Wednesday, April 25, 2001 - 10:07 pm:

It finally activated! For some unknown reason, the game allowed me to enter it in 1034, so I finally got Worm! *begins to cheer*
